mapper.select: /* 여행지 정보를 컬럼 이름과 값으로 찾은 후 JSON 객체로 반환 */ SELECT CONCAT_WS('\\\\', JSON_OBJECT( 'name', tour_detail_title, 'lat', tour_detail_latitude, 'lng', tour_detail_longitude, 'contentTypeId', tour_detail_content_type_id, 'contentId', tour_detail_content_id, 'overview', tour_detail_overview, 'imageLink', tour_detail_first_image, 'telName', tour_detail_tel_name, 'telNum', tour_detail_tel_num, 'addr', CONCAT(tour_detail_first_addr, tour_detail_second_addr) ) ) FROM TOUR_DETAIL_FROM_API WHERE ${colName} = #{content};
